subject: Horse Racing
Breeders' Cup (Horse Races)
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: American Pharoah, the favorite, who won the Triple Crown this year, should cruise to an uncontested early lead and could stay out front every step of the way.
snippet: American Pharoah, the favorite, who won the Triple Crown this year, should cruise to an uncontested early lead and could stay out front every step of the way.
